{"step_by_step_thinking": "The fear of a 6 year old related to dentistry is primarily subjective because it is based on the child's personal feelings, thoughts, and experiences. It is not objective because it is not based on facts or evidence but rather on the child's perception of the situation. It is not both subjective and objective because the fear is not based on both personal feelings and facts or evidence. It is psychological because it involves the mind and emotions of the child.", "answer_choice": "D. Psychological"}
